name: Dice Club
description:
Welcome to Dice Club! How long can you last in this chaotic arena until your luck runs out?

Punch the dangerous dice repeatedly to roll them for random effects! Smack dead dice again to send them flying to create chaos and rack up high scores

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Left Mouse to punch
  • Esc to pause the game

Credits

A game by Quite Good - Discord - Twitter

Starring..

  • Julien Collins - Programming and Game Design
  • Fred LePage - Programming and Game Design
  • Shane Rathle FlamiingPickle - Art, Animation and Game Design
  • Noah DeWald noah_dewald - Environment Art, Design and Game Design
  • Ethan Collins - Music

Tested on Windows 10 and Google Chrome.
